manifest.title: ONLYOFFICE Docs
manifest.author: Cloudron Team
manifest.description:
### Overview

ONLYOFFICE provides you with the most secure way to create, edit and collaborate on business documents online.
It is 100% compatible with MS Office formats.

Use this together with Nextcloud to build a powerfull collaboration suite or integrate with many other [3rdparty solutions](https://www.onlyoffice.com/all-connectors.aspx)
manifest.tagline: Open source office and productivity suite

change-default-secret.message: Change the default secret in `/app/data/config/production-linux.json`. There are two places in the file where you need to change the secret.

manifest.postInstallMessage:
This app has to be setup alongside NextCloud to provide a document editor.

In your NextCloud installation, install the OnlyOffice app and configure it
to use this app's domain and use `changeme` as the secret key.
